caption.title: Novel p1 gene sequence variations in strains M282 and K708.
caption.p: (A) Schematic diagram of the PCR amplicons obtained using the primers ADH3 and ADH4, containing RepMP2/3 region of the p1 gene. Predicted HaeIII sites within the amplicons from strains FH (type 2), 309 (type 2a), M282 (type 2f), and K708 (type 2g) are shown. Light blue boxes indicate the regions of sequence variations compared to that of the type strain FH. (B) Simulated pattern of 2% agarose electrophoresis of HaeIII-digested amplicon fragments predicted by using the p1 gene sequences (GenBank accession nos. CP010546, AP012303, LC390170 and LC385984). The pattern was calculated by using SnapGene software version 4.2.3 (Snapgene.com). (C) Theoretical size of HaeIII-digested amplicon fragments.
